description: Next.js-based website builder platform for creating client preview sites with templates and AI assistance

stories.title: Project Structure Setup
acceptance_criteria: Next.js 14+ project initialized with App Router at root
npm run dev starts successfully on localhost:3000

stories.title: Shadcn UI Components Setup
acceptance_criteria: utils.ts with cn() helper at src/lib/utils.ts

stories.title: Type Definitions
acceptance_criteria: Template type defined with id, name, category, description, thumbnail
Page type defined with slug, title, content
ClientContent type for hero, services, about, contact sections
Status enum: PROSPECT, DEMO_SENT, APPROVED, IN_PROGRESS, DEPLOYED, REJECTED
ColorScheme type with primary, secondary, accent colors

stories.title: Service Business Template - Header
acceptance_criteria: Accepts businessName prop and displays it
Accepts navigation array prop with label and href
Accepts phone prop for click-to-call link
Mobile-responsive with hamburger menu on small screens
Uses Tailwind for styling, no external CSS

stories.title: Service Business Template - Hero
acceptance_criteria: Accepts headline, subheadline, ctaText, ctaLink props
CTA button links to contact section or custom URL
Supports custom color scheme via props or CSS variables

stories.title: Service Business Template - Services Grid
acceptance_criteria: Accepts services array with name, description, icon properties
Renders services in responsive grid (1 col mobile, 2-3 cols desktop)
Each service card shows icon, name, and description
Uses Lucide icons by icon name string

stories.title: Service Business Template - Testimonials
acceptance_criteria: Accepts testimonials array with quote, author, role, avatar properties

stories.title: Service Business Template - Contact Section
acceptance_criteria: Contact form with name, email, phone, message fields
Displays business contact info: phone, email, address
Form uses shadcn Input and Button components

stories.title: Service Business Template - Footer
acceptance_criteria: Displays business name and copyright year
Shows contact info: phone, email, address

stories.title: Service Business Full Template Assembly
acceptance_criteria: Composes all section components: Header, Hero, Services, Testimonials, Contact, Footer
Accepts single ClientData prop with all content
Passes appropriate data to each section component
Exports as default for dynamic import

stories.title: Client Data Loader Utility
acceptance_criteria: getAllClients function returns array of all clients

stories.title: Dynamic Preview Route
acceptance_criteria: Uses getClientBySlug to load client data
Shows 404 page for unknown client slugs
Page is server-side rendered with generateStaticParams

stories.title: Dashboard Layout Shell
acceptance_criteria: Sidebar has links: Dashboard, Clients, Templates, Settings
Header with user avatar placeholder and logout button
Responsive: sidebar collapses to hamburger on mobile
Main content area with proper padding

stories.title: Dashboard Overview Page
acceptance_criteria: Shows count cards: Total Clients, Demos Sent, Approved, Deployed
Recent clients list showing last 5 clients
Each client row shows name, status badge, created date
Quick action buttons: Add Client, View All Clients
Uses shadcn Card components for stats

stories.title: Clients List Page
acceptance_criteria: Table displaying all clients with columns: Name, Status, Template, Created, Actions
Status shown as colored badge (green=deployed, yellow=demo_sent, etc.)
Action buttons: View Preview, Edit, Delete
Search/filter input to find clients by name
Add New Client button at top of page

stories.title: Add/Edit Client Form
acceptance_criteria: Form fields: Business Name, Slug (auto-generated), Email, Phone, Current Website URL
Save creates/updates JSON file in src/data/clients/

stories.title: Client Content Editor
acceptance_criteria: Tabbed interface: Hero, Services, About, Contact, Colors
Hero tab: headline, subheadline, CTA text inputs
Services tab: add/remove/edit services with icon picker
Contact tab: phone, email, address inputs
Colors tab: primary, secondary, accent color pickers
Preview button opens /preview/[slug] in new tab

stories.title: Templates Gallery Page
acceptance_criteria: Grid of template cards with thumbnail preview
Each card shows: name, category, description
Click card to see full preview
Use Template button links to new client form with template pre-selected

stories.title: Preview Subpages Route
acceptance_criteria: Loads page content from client JSON pages array
Supports dynamic page creation from dashboard

stories.title: Preview Password Protection
acceptance_criteria: Optional password field in client JSON
Password gate component shown before preview
Simple form: enter password to view
Password stored in cookie for session
Clear password link in footer for testing

stories.title: Preview Mobile Responsiveness Toolbar
acceptance_criteria: Floating toolbar on preview pages (dashboard users only)
Toggle buttons: Desktop, Tablet, Mobile viewport sizes
Preview renders in iframe with selected width

stories.title: Preview Share Link Generator
acceptance_criteria: Generate shareable link with optional expiry
Token stored in client JSON shareLinks array
Expired links show friendly error message
Dashboard shows list of active share links

stories.title: Website Scraper - Basic Info
acceptance_criteria: Extracts: page title, meta description, headings
Extracts: phone numbers, email addresses from page
Error handling for invalid URLs or blocked sites

stories.title: Website Scraper - Images and Logo
acceptance_criteria: Extracts logo from common locations (header img, favicon, og:image)
Returns array of image URLs with suggested usage

stories.title: AI Content Generation - Service Descriptions
acceptance_criteria: Accepts business type and service list
Returns array matching input services with enhanced descriptions
Caches results to avoid duplicate API calls

stories.title: AI Content Generation - Hero Copy
acceptance_criteria: Generate hero headline and subheadline from business info
Accepts: business name, type, location, key services
Returns 3 headline/subheadline options to choose from

stories.title: Image Upload and Management
acceptance_criteria: Image gallery showing all client uploads
Returns URL for use in content editor

stories.title: Export to Static HTML
acceptance_criteria: Renders client preview pages to static HTML
Includes basic README with hosting instructions

stories.title: Export to Next.js Project
acceptance_criteria: Includes only needed components for that client

stories.title: Direct Vercel Deployment
acceptance_criteria: Creates new Vercel project from exported code
Stores deployment info in client record

stories.title: Custom Domain Setup Guide
acceptance_criteria: Link to Vercel dashboard for advanced settings

stories.title: Marketing Homepage
acceptance_criteria: How it works section with 3-4 steps
CTA to contact or view pricing

stories.title: Portfolio Page
acceptance_criteria: Each shows thumbnail, client name, industry
Click to view live site or case study
Pulls from deployed clients with permission flag

stories.title: Contact Page
acceptance_criteria: Contact form: name, email, phone, business name, message

stories.title: Sitemap.xml Generator
acceptance_criteria: Includes all pages: home, services, about, contact, any custom pages
Each URL has lastmod, changefreq, and priority attributes
Exported sitemap included in static HTML export
API route at src/app/api/sitemap/[clientSlug]/route.ts for dynamic generation

stories.title: Robots.txt Generator with AI Crawlers
acceptance_criteria: Allows all standard crawlers: Googlebot, Bingbot
Allows AI crawlers: GPTBot, OAI-SearchBot, PerplexityBot, ClaudeBot, CCBot
Exported robots.txt included in static HTML export

stories.title: LocalBusiness JSON-LD Schema Generator
acceptance_criteria: Includes: @type, name, telephone, email, address (street, city, state, zip)
Includes: openingHours, priceRange, serviceArea if provided
Component renders script tag with type application/ld+json

stories.title: Meta Tags Generator
acceptance_criteria: generateMetaTags(pageData, clientData) returns meta tag object
Generates Open Graph tags: og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url, og:type
Generates Twitter card tags: twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description
SEO component at src/components/seo/MetaTags.tsx using Next.js Metadata API
Title format: Page Title | Business Name | Location
Description auto-generated from page content if not provided

stories.title: llms.txt Generator for AI Discoverability
acceptance_criteria: Includes: business name, description, location, service area
Lists all services with brief descriptions and links
Includes contact information: phone, email, address
Links to key pages: home, services, about, contact
Exported llms.txt included in static HTML export

stories.title: FAQ Schema Component
acceptance_criteria: Accepts faqs array with question and answer properties
FAQ data field added to client JSON structure
FAQ tab added to content editor in dashboard

stories.title: Review/Rating Schema Integration
acceptance_criteria: Calculates average rating from testimonials with ratings
Generates individual Review schemas for each testimonial
Rating field (1-5) added to testimonial data structure
Star rating display updated to use actual rating value

stories.title: SEO Dashboard Panel
acceptance_criteria: SEO tab added to client content editor
Shows checklist of SEO completeness: title, description, schema, etc.
Preview of how site appears in Google search results
Link to test tools: Google Rich Results Test, Schema Validator
